text: Sorry HubSpot but the current tutorial is really hard to understand and i would like to use this feature. We work locally with CodeKit and upload it to a GitHub repository
How is it easy to combine this with HubSpot?

Hey there :wave:

If anyone on HubSpot team reading this, appreciate any update.
It looks like currently there are some changes happening to the way how HubSpot is working.
It seems those changes are in real time. While doing my usual local dev routing I enchanted lots of issues. After the hours of notorious trouble shooting I realized that something with HS itself. For example, somehow the css of the theme is edited by HS on the server side. My css converted to some “combined.css”
Page previews doesn’t work at all. Cashing is unbearable, the code can’t be overwritten.
Some really weird stuff happening.
<@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6> do you know anything about this? Is this maintenance hours I’m encountering with?
Hey Olia, With the caching and page previews it sounds like you’re potentially experiencing a bug. I’d advise <https://help.HubSpot.com/|contacting support>.

Thanks <@U7SL518D6> I’ll contact them. Thanks
Do you have any information about combined.css? Is it some sort of performance improvement?
(just noting I responded via DM so others don’t feel that was left unanswered)
Looks like a connection error. Are you online? using a VPN? Can you Ping 104.17.202.204:443?
That sounds really odd.. Is it marked as a theme in DM? And have you triple-checked the spelling?
